attributes.action: Stop the Modernising Medical Careers (MMC) plans
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The plans to Modernise Medical Careers makes training to become a specialist in any field of medicine so competitive that too many doctors will NOT be trained, and many might leave the country all together leaving the UK again exposed to a shortage of doctors. 
Alternatively it will leave a lot of disillusioned doctors, who have so far given a lot to the UK, but get nothing in return.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop the Modernising Medical Careers (MMC) plans."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page10820.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Stop-MMC/
